name: Snakession
description:
PLEASE ENABLE FULLSCREEN FOR WEBGL.

You control an snake that eat food to grow bigger in size to then eat it own tail to begin an new cycle with upgrade.
Control using mouse.

Credits:

  • An thank to Jeremy Tribby for the Barlow font.
  • An thank to Cadson Demak for the Itim font.
  • An thank to megupets the music.
  • Programming/Art by Huntrt.
  • Sound by Huntrt using ChipTone.
